channel.title: What Check-in Policies Do You Want?
channel.description: Now V1.0 of Teamprise is out the door, we have started on the next release and are looking at the features that people want.  One of these is Check-in policy support.  Due to the way check-in policies are implemented in...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ognjen Bajic+00:00
item.description: Some code complexity metrics calculated for the code that is about to be checked in and compared with certain thresholds. I have especially cyclomatic complexity in mind.
item.dc:creator: Ognjen Bajic

item.title: Comment by Richard Murillo+00:00
item.description:
A few policies that I find useful:
* Static code analysis must run without error * Check-ins are prohibited on certain branches by certain people (configuration done by windows security group)
item.dc:creator: Richard Murillo
